overview: Sanford has over 10 years of experience in the Interactive industry. As the VP of Technology at Supernova, Sanford is responsible for planning and executing all of Supernovaâ€™s online objectives. Sanford began his career in the Communication and Public Affairs Department at Toronto District School Board. While there, he planned and executed content delivery platforms, participated in the development of the corporate website, and launched over a dozen web initiatives. Sanford diversified his portfolio of experience by joining Henderson Bas, one of Canada’s most acclaimed interactive agencies. Sanfordâ€™s work on notable accounts such as Nike and Molson earned him accolades from Marketing Magazine, Applied Arts Magazine, ADCC Directions, and the London International Awards. Sanford holds an Honours Bachelor for Computer Science from the University of Toronto where he specialized in information systems.
